text: István Tamás Soproni (Budapest, February 20, 1986) is a Hungarian professional translator, politician of the Momentum Movement, and mayor of Terézváros. == His life == He has lived in Terézváros since he was a child. In 2007, he graduated from the Faculty of Humanities at Eötvös Loránd University, in the English-American Institute with a degree in English studies, but he did not complete his studies in international relations. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Hungarian mayors Category:1986 births Category:Momentum Movement
title: Tamás Soproni
